005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ICollectionValue;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IArrayItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
018
019import java.util.ArrayList;
020import java.util.Collections;
021import java.util.List;
022
023import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
024
025public final class ArrayReverse {
026  @NonNull
027  public static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
028      .name("reverse")
029      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_ARRAY)
030      .deterministic()
031      .contextIndependent()
032      .focusIndependent()
033      .argument(IArgument.builder()
034          .name("array")
035          .type(IArrayItem.class)
036          .one()
037          .build())
038      .returnType(IArrayItem.class)
039      .returnOne()
040      .functionHandler(ArrayReverse::execute)
041      .build();
042
043  private ArrayReverse() {
044    // disable construction
045  }
046
047  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
048  @NonNull
049  private static <T extends ICollectionValue> ISequence<IArrayItem<T>> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
050      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
051      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
052      IItem focus) {
053    IArrayItem<T> array = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(
054        arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true)));
055
056    return ISequence.of(reverse(array));
057  }
058
059  /**
060   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
061   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-array-reverse">array:reverse</a>.
062   *
063   * @param <T>
064   *          the type of items in the given Metapath array
065   * @param array
066   *          the target Metapath array
067   * @return a new array containing the modification
068   */
069  @NonNull
070  public static <T extends ICollectionValue> IArrayItem<T> reverse(
071      @NonNull IArrayItem<T> array) {
072    List<T> copy = new ArrayList<>(array);
073    Collections.reverse(copy);
074    return IArrayItem.ofCollection(copy);
075  }
076}
